#summary Set up cron jobs for EVE API
#labels Phase-Deploy
= Cron Jobs =

== Setting Up ==

In 4 easy steps.
  * Download com_cron.zip
  * Install extension through Joomla! backend
  * Set your crontab to execute `cron/index.php`
  * Add new job. Go to Joomla Administration -> Components -> Cron -> New

Pattern: * * * * *   	
Type: cron
Plugin:
Event: onCronTick
Enabled: Yes

== Details ==

For some reason, Joomla! doesn't support scheduling tasks by any _normal_ way. So I had to add another entry point for Joomla!, similar to administration, installation or xmlrpc.
